channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Department of Bioengineering, Imperial College London on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Learning Cortico-Muscular Dependence through Orthonormal Decomposition of Density Ratios
item.description: Unveiling cortico-muscular dependence using orthonormal decomposition of density ratios, FMCA-T, enhances movement classification and reveals channel-temporal dependencies.
